channel.title: Abouts on Eric Peña
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Eric Peña

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Overview

  • Data Scientist interested in Complex Systems
  • M.S. in Complex Systems Science as a Clifford D. Clark Diversity Fellow at the State University of New York at Binghamton and studied machine learning and complex systems modeling
  • B.S. in Engineering Physics as a Young Scholar at The Ohio State University

Experience

  • Senior Data Scientist, Statistician, Torc Robotics
  • Senior Data Scientist, Motional
  • Statistics and Probability Teacher, SUNY Binghamton
  • Revenue Management Senior Data Analyst, Diageo
  • Math and Physics Tutor, Self-Employed
  • Engineer, H.B. Fuller
  • Physics Teacher, OSU Physics
  • Physics Demonstrations Assistant, OSU Physics

Talks, Publications, and Posters

  • IEEE Transactions on Network Science and Engineering Journal 2024
    • (publication) Sparse Bayesian Learning for Sequential Inference of Network Connectivity from Small Data
  • Conference on Artificial Life (ALIFE) 2022
    • (talk) Life Worth Mentioning
  • Wolfram Demonstration Project 2022
    • (demonstration) Cellular Automata with Modified Game-of-Life Rules
  • Artificial Life Journal 2021
    • (publication) Life Worth Mentioning: Complexity of Life-Like Cellular Automata
  • Conference on Complex Systems (CCS) 2021
    • (talk) Life Worth Mentioning
  • Norteast Regional Conference on Complex Systems (NERCCS) 2021
    • (talk) Complexity in Conway’s Game of Life and other Life-Like Cellular Automata
    • (poster) Bayesian Sparse Network Reconstruction
  • Norteast Regional Conference on Complex Systems (NERCCS) 2020
    • (poster) Cellular Automata Optimization using Genetic Algorithms

Awards

  • IISE Finalist Award in Best Paper Competition, Awarded by IISE Conference (2024)
  • Mobilizer Award, Awarded by Motional (2023)
  • Mobilizer Award (post), Awarded by Motional (2022)
  • Graduate Service to Department in Systems Science Award (post), Awarded by Binghamton University (2021)
  • Honorable Mention for Best Poster Award (post), Awarded by Northeast Regional Conference on Complex Systems (2020)
  • Clifford D. Clark Diversity Fellow (link), Two years — Awarded by Binghamton University (2019—2021)
  • Young Scholars Program Scholarship, Five years — Awarded by The OSU Office of Diversity and Inclusion (2008—2013)

Education

  • Master of Science, Binghamton University. 2021. (4.0 GPA)
    • Systems Science
    • Thesis: Life Worth Mentioning: Complexity of Life-Like Cellular Automata
  • Advanced Graduate Certificate, Binghamton University. 2021. (4.0 GPA)
    • Collective Dynamics of Complex Systems and Engineering
  • Bachelor of Science, The Ohio State University. 2014.
    • Engineering Physics — (specialization: Computer Science and Engineering)

Contact

  • Email: eric.pena@binghamton.edu
  • I’m happy to serve as an ambassador for the Binghamton University System Science and Industrial Engineering Department.
